response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This unique item holds immense value to me and I believe it would be a significant asset to your collection or business. Given its importance to both parties, I am extending this exclusive offer to you.

For a limited time, I am willing to sell the product to you at a special price of $1,300,000. This represents a substantial discount compared to its market value, providing you with an exceptional opportunity to secure a valuable item at a favorable price.

Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I am confident that you will find the product to be well worth the investment and I am eager to facilitate this transaction with you.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1300000}
